summary: Nurick and Yaroslav are trying to robe a crime boss. Unfortunately, Nurick dies but returns to the world with a mission: to be the guardian angel of Yaroslav.
cast: Aleksey Chadov|Merab Ninidze|Sergey Makovetskiy|Guram Bablishvili|Beso Gataev|Kakhi Kavsadze|Yekaterina Rednikova|Mariya Andreeva|Mariya Zvonaryova|Andrey Rudenskiy|Sergey Godin|Ruslan Yagudin|Maksim Kostromykin|Aleksandr Golovin|Igor Jijikine|Sergey Frolov|Maksim Borisov|Stepan Abramov|Omar Alibutaev|Ruslan Askerov|Dzhon Bakhanbaev|Mikhail Bogdasarov|Olga Dibtseva|Yaroslav Garnaev|Nadzhaf Kerimov|Irina Kireeva|Maksim Konovalov|Kirill Kovbas|Nikolay Kovbas|Artem Lyskov|Sergey Makarov|Oleg Maslennikov-Voytov|Roman Matyunin|Igor Nesvetaev|Viktor Nizovoy|Evgeniy Sangadzhiev|Tatyana Shchankina|Aleksandr Sukhinin|Vladimir Tereshchenko|Rodion Tolokonnikov|Sergey Udovik|Maksim Vazhov|Irina Znamenshchikova
title: Ch/B
